name: more-stupid-tennesseans-would-be-assassins-foiled-by-atf
title: More Stupid Tennesseans: Would-Be Assassins Foiled By ATF
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded: Tennessee has been churning out the crazies in droves these days. Jim Cavanaugh, of the Nashville field office for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco Firearms and Explosives, released a statement today letting us know that they’ve broken up a plot by two neo-Nazi skinheads to go on a killing spree that was supposed to culminate with the assassination of Senator Barack Obama. The racially-charged murder plans included a high school shooting and decapitations, all to begin in our beloved state. We’re glad that the ATF has these particular crazies on lockdown now. See also: Yahoo, WSMV.
